timeline.message:
Update comment parser handling

Now apparent comments inside
strings are left untouched.

Fixes #7082
Use comment parser also in ImportExtractor

timeline.body:
![CRITICAL](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/severity-critical.png 'Severity: CRITICAL') Refactor this code to not nest more than 3 if/for/while/switch/try statements. [![rule](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/rule.png)](https://sonar.projects.vaadin.com/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS134)
![MINOR](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/severity-minor.png 'Severity: MINOR') Move the "/" string literal on the left side of this string comparison. [![rule](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/rule.png)](https://sonar.projects.vaadin.com/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS1132)

timeline.body:
![CRITICAL](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/severity-critical.png 'Severity: CRITICAL') Reorder the modifiers to comply with the Java Language Specification. [![rule](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/rule.png)](https://sonar.projects.vaadin.com/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AModifiersOrderCheck)
![MAJOR](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/severity-major.png 'Severity: MAJOR') Refactor this method to reduce its Cognitive Complexity from 30 to the 15 allowed. [![rule](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/rule.png)](https://sonar.projects.vaadin.com/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS3776)
![MINOR](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/severity-minor.png 'Severity: MINOR') "final" is redundant in this context. [![rule](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/rule.png)](https://sonar.projects.vaadin.com/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS2333)
timeline.bodyText:
Reorder the modifiers to comply with the Java Language Specification. 
 Refactor this method to reduce its Cognitive Complexity from 30 to the 15 allowed. 
 "final" is redundant in this context.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Reorder the modifiers to comply with the Java Language Specification.
Refactor this method to reduce its Cognitive Complexity from 30 to the 15 allowed.
"final" is redundant in this context.

+package com.vaadin.flow.internal;

+/**
+ * Utility class for special string handling.
+ */
+public final class StringUtil {
+
+    /**
+     * Comment parser state enumeration.
+     */
+    private enum State {
+        NORMAL, IN_LINE_COMMENT, IN_BLOCK_COMMENT, IN_STRING
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Removes comments (block comments and line comments) from the JS code.
+     *
+     * @return the code with removed comments
+     */

+        StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();
+        Scanner scanner = new Scanner(code);
+        scanner.useDelimiter("");
+        while (scanner.hasNext()) {
+            String character = scanner.next();
+            switch (state) {

+package com.vaadin.flow.internal;
+
+import java.util.Scanner;
+
+/**
+ * Utility class for special string handling.
+ */
+public final class StringUtil {
+
+    /**
+     * Comment parser state enumeration.
+     */
+    private enum State {
+        NORMAL, IN_LINE_COMMENT, IN_BLOCK_COMMENT, IN_STRING
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Removes comments (block comments and line comments) from the JS code.
+     *
+     * @return the code with removed comments
+     */
+    public final static String removeComments(String code) {
+        State state = State.NORMAL;
+        StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();
+        Scanner scanner = new Scanner(code);
+        scanner.useDelimiter("");
+        while (scanner.hasNext()) {
+            String character = scanner.next();
+            switch (state) {
+            case NORMAL:
+                if (character.equals("/") && scanner.hasNext()) {
